LoginContent: Welcome back! Please login to your account
GoogleAuthError: Google authentication error. Please try again.
GoogleLoginFailed: Google login failed. Please try again.
PasswordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
RegisterContent: Create your account to get started
ForgotPasswordContent: Enter your email to receive a password reset link
EmailSentContent: Password reset request has been sent. Please check your email to continue.
ErrorOccurred: An error occurred. Please try again later.
ResetPasswordSuccess: Password has been reset successfully. You can now login with your new password.
ResetPasswordError: An error occurred while resetting password. Please try again later or request a new link.
InvalidOrExpiredTokenContent: This password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new password reset.
CreateNewPassword: Create a new password for your account
ResendEmailContent: Enter your email address to receive a new confirmation email
ResendEmailSuccessContent: We have sent a confirmation email to your email address. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions to confirm your account.
EmailVerificationSuccessContent: Thank you for verifying your email. Your account has been activated.
EmailVerificationFailedContent: We could not verify your email address. This may be because the link has expired or is invalid.
VerificationStep1: Check that you are using the latest confirmation link sent to your email.
VerificationStep2: Click the link directly from the email instead of copying and pasting.
VerificationStep3: Request a new confirmation email if the problem persists.
InvalidVerificationLink: Invalid verification link. Missing required information.
VerificationLinkExpired: Email verification failed. The link may have expired or is invalid.
EmailAlreadyConfirmedContent: Your email has been previously verified. You can login now.
AccountActivatedSuccess: Your account has been successfully activated. You can start using Ottobit now!
EmailVerificationResent: Verification email has been resent. Please check your inbox.
